If a red source you control would deal an amount of noncombat damage less than the greatest power among creatures you control to an opponent, that source deals damage equal to the greatest power among creatures you control instead.
When this artifact enters, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Retrofit {2}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
